original_text: People buried his dead body. On the third day after that God raised him up to live again. The Bible already spoke about that too.
korean_text: 장사 지낸 바 되셨다가 성경대로 사흘 만에 다시 살아나사

sentences.original_text: On the third day after that
God raised him up to live again
The Bible already spoke about that too
